lessons.title: Contribute
lessons.description:
Help others learn!

Code Crispies is open source and always looking for new lessons. You can contribute by:

â€¢ Writing new lessons - Share your knowledge on topics we haven't covered
â€¢ Translating lessons - Help make Code Crispies accessible in more languages
â€¢ Fixing bugs - Found something broken? Help us fix it!
â€¢ Improving content - Make existing lessons clearer and better

Get started:
â€¢ Gitea Repository - Main source code
â€¢ GitHub Mirror - Alternative access

Lessons are simple JSON files in the lessons/ folder. Check existing lessons for the format!
